name: Creative Colours
description:
Creative Colours is a top down view game that has a simple mechanic. Get through the coloured tiles to beat the level! Created and designed for "Game a Week" of GDS230.

Instructions:
Mouse right-click to move.

Music provided by: minari studio みなりスタジオ
Original: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F20f9kchk6k
